text: Płomyczek ('Little flame') is a Polish children's magazine established in 1917. It was created to accompany Płomyk, a magazine for older children and teens (defunct since 1991). Płomyczek is published in Warsaw. ==References== Category:Magazines established in 1917 Category:Children's magazines published in Poland Category:Polish-language magazines Category:Magazines published in Warsaw
title: Płomyczek
